p: In contrast, when MK-886 was used to indirectly inhibit 5-LOX, daidzein-induced antiviral activity was not inhibited (Supplemental Fig. 1A *). Additionally, MK-886 did not affect 5-HETE production in daidzein-treated cells (Supplemental Fig. 1B). This suggests that MK-886 does not inhibit 5-LOX activity in MDCK cells.
